tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE threats (
  threat_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  threat_type VARCHAR(50),
  threat_description TEXT,
  threat_level INT,
  threat_source VARCHAR(50),
  detection_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ThreatIntelligenceData (
    indicator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    indicator_type VARCHAR(50),
    indicator_value TEXT,
    threat_type VARCHAR(50),
    source VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE CorrelationAnalysis (
    correlation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    threat1_indicator_id INT,
    threat2_indicator_id INT,
    correlation_score FLOAT,
    correlation_description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE threat_intelligence (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    indicator VARCHAR(255),
    indicator_type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    source VARCHAR(100),
    threat_level VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE correlation_analysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rule_name VARCHAR(100),
    condition VARCHAR(255),
    action VARCHAR(50),
    severity VARCHAR(20),
    last_updated_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE threat_intel_correlation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    threat_id INT REFERENCES threat_intelligence(id),
    correlation_id INT REFERENCES correlation_analysis(id),
    correlation_result TEXT,
    correlation_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ThreatIntelData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    threat_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    severity INT,
    date_reported DATE
);

CREATE TABLE CorrelationAnalysis (
    correlation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    threat_id INT,
    source_id INT,
    correlation_score FLOAT,
    date_analyzed DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ThreatActors (
    actor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    actor_name VARCHAR(255),
    target_industry VARCHAR(100),
    known_tactics TEXT,
    date_identified DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ThreatIntelligenceData (
id INT PRIMARY KEY,
source VARCHAR(255),
severity INT,
description TEXT,
date_added DATE
)

CREATE TABLE CorrelationAnalysis (
analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
threat_id INT,
result VARCHAR(255),
confidence FLOAT,
date_analyzed DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ThreatActors (
actor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
actor_name VARCHAR(255),
country VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Indicators (
indicator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
threat_id INT,
indicator_type VARCHAR(50),
value VARCHAR(255),
date_published DATE
)

CREATE TABLE MitigationStrategies (
strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
threat_id INT,
strategy_description TEXT,
effectiveness_rating INT
)
